entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
